New Jersey

State Wide Donation Links

National Bail Fund Network: The National Bail Fund Network is a regularly updated directory of funds that work towards posting bond for those incarcerated. Their goal is to abolish the money bail system and pretrial detention.

New Jersey ACLU: ACLU of New Jersey is working tirelessly to defend the individual rights and liberties guaranteed to all people by the US and New Jersey Constitutions.

Black Owned Businesses: Support Black business owners in New Jersey
